snippet.title: Ballad of Gay Tony a gutsy, exciting end to Liberty City
snippet.description: ...The retail release of Grand Theft Auto: Episodes from Liberty City is a weird beast. A standalone disc with both the "Lost and the Damned" and the "Ballad of Gay Tony" expansions... and are experiencing the Ballad of Gay Tony as a standalone game you won't feel out touchin fact the game...

snippet.title: PlayStation Store update: Chopin's Eden edition
snippet.description: ...Last week was a huge week for content on the PlayStation Store, so naturally this week is a little quieter. Nevertheless, theres still some new content to download this week, including a nice selection of demos. Check it out: GamesPSP: Work Time Fun ($9.99): Sonys take on the WarioWare franchise, WTF is a collection of ridiculous microgames shot at the user in rapid succession.PSP: Untold Legends...

snippet.title: Sony fights Kindle juggernaut with public domain e-books
snippet.description: ...The first line of the press release reads, "Content for the Reader Digital Book by Sony just blew wide open" doesn't make much literal sensecontent can't "blow open"but it does make clear that Sony regards its new partnership with Google Book Search as big news. In what appears to be a move to undercut the Kindle by offering scads of free content, Sony now provides a...
